CSTS

This is the main CSTS class that bootstraps and loads everything.  This class also creates a global object that everything can be attached to.

Variables
startTime

The time the application started

db

Wrapper to hold all the database collections

routes

Wrapper to hold all the routes used in application navigation

router

This holds the router object

models

Wrapper to hold all the model objects

libs

Wrapper to hold all the generic library objects

controllers

Wrapper to hold all the controller objects

plugins

wrapper for all the plugins the CSTS uses from node modules

crypto

cryptographic functions

cpu

cpu statistics

cron

cron jobs

dns

dns framework

fs

file system module

ejs

Embedded JavaScript templates

isElevated

determins if the user is elevated

os

pulls information from the os

moment

used for managing time objects

navigo

the router used for navigating the site

path

module to handle filesystem paths

util

utility module

zlib

zlib compression

tray

works with the systray and taskbar

win

module to manage the application window

reload

watches for changes in the file system and reloads the application

shell

allows nwjs to interface with powershell

si

system information module

xlsx

reads and writes various spreadsheet files

Datastore

database module

Functions
init
init : function()

This function initializes the csts class

require
require : function(
script
)

Used to include dynamic files in the browser

ad

Active directory wrapper

Functions
fqdn
fqdn : function()

Determines the hosts fully qualified domain name

Parameters
Returns
String

FQDN of host

See Also

ouChildren

ouChildren
ouChildren : function(
ou
)

Returns the child nodes for a given OU

Parameters
ou

String of path to OU

Returns
String

JSON object of OU children

See Also

fqdn

export

This object is responsible for exporting reports in DOC, PDF and CSV formats

Functions
doc
doc : function(
content,
filename
)

Exports reports in DOC formats

Parameters
content

The html content being exported

filename

The name of the file to save as

csv
csv : function(
data,
filename
)

Exports reports in CSV formats

Parameters
data

JSON Object containing data to export

filename

The name of the file to save as

pdf
pdf : function(
data,
filename
)

Exports reports in PDF formats

Parameters
content

JSON Object containing data to export

filename

The name of the file to save as

utils

Object that contains utility type functions for the CSTS

Functions
blob
blob : function(
mime,
content,
filename
)

This method will allow files to be saved from the CSTS app (file save dialog)

Parameters
mime

The mime type of the file to save

content

The data to be saved

filename

The name of the file to save asin

toggleHosts
toggleHosts : function()

Shows or hides the hosts column of the CSTS application

guid
guid : function()

Generates a GUID like string

debug
debug : function(
msg
)

Will log a message to the console if the application environment is set to developmental

Parameters
msg

A String or object to be logged
